Classes

struct  bin_type

Detailed Description

template<typename _Tp>
class SimpleOctree< _Tp >

Simple Octree for any datatype with an associated 3D position.

It is reasonably efficient when compared with brute force, but a few more checks and the number of returned points, etc would be reduced further.

Member Function Documentation

template<typename _Tp>
void SimpleOctree< _Tp >::bin_positions ( const std::vector< const my_float_t * > &  pos_vec,
const my_float_t  max_dist,
std::vector< bin_type > *  bins 
) [inline]

This function was not tested enough and it should also be timed to check if it is really any faster than near_by_points for each point
